channel.title: artificial neural network on Fatih Uenal, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in artificial neural network on Fatih Uenal, PhD

item.title: NLP pipeline for text-classification
item.description: Project Details This application is based on an Artificial Neural Network model to classify policy texts using data from various sources such as news-articles and official government databases.

item.title: Using AI and Data Science in climate policy research
item.description: Project Details At the University of Oxford, I present how we use AI and Data Science to accelerate and improve the policy research and advocacy work at the Fossil Fuel Non-Proliferation Treaty Initiative.
